name: RN apps: Emoji reaction in center channel: - Add using long press- Add using `+`

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Update notes: Linda 22 Aug 2022: Added RN_Smoke_Tests label during test case cleanup.

inline.description:
Emoji reaction in center channel:
- Add using long press
- Add using `+`
————————————————————————————
In center channel:
  1. Long press on a message and select Add Reaction
  2. Type a couple characters in the search bar and select an emoji
  3. Verify added
  4. In message box, type `+:` and a couple characters
  5. Tap to select an emoji from the autocomplete list
inline.expectedResult: • Reaction is added to message in each case (when added by typing, the reaction is added to the most recent "real" (not ephemeral or system) message in the channel)
